General.Name: Shinhung
General.Description: Shinhung Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells dental products and supplies in South Korea. Its products include implant systems; dental units, chairs, operatories, and implants; autoclaves and X-ray equipment; disposable needles; dental porcelain powder and laboratory products; dental alloys; cabinets, such as drawer cabinets, equipment cabinets, soap dispensers, sink cabinets, lateral panels, insert cabinets, and mobile cabinets; and other equipment, which include compressors and mixers. The company also offers loan services for dentists. Shinhung Co., Ltd. was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Yong-Ik  Yi
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Pres and Director
